title: A Resumption Monad Transformer and its Applications in the Semantics of Concurrency
abstract: Resumptions are a valuable tool in the analysis and de- sign of semantic models for concurrent programming lan- guages, in which computations consist of sequences of atomic steps that may be interleaved.
